description: One of the seven heads of the 88 kiyakou. A youkai who kills other Land gods who can`t fight back and turns their beliefs into his fear. Legend says that if you receive a tug on your sleeve and turn to see no one there, it is Sodemogi-sama who will when curse you. He seems to enjoy devouring articles of clothing from others. He curses Torii eating away at her life force and as a result is killed by Kurotabou.
name: Sodemogi-sama
